subject: Bahasa Inggris
title: Latihan Soal SAS Ganjil Bahasa Inggris Kelas 5 (Paket 2)
subtitle: Paket 50 soal variasi baru mencakup materi Taste, Quantifiers, Prices, Health, dan Clothes.

questions.text:
A: 'How does the tamarind taste?'
B: 'It tastes ...'
Look at the picture of the salt. The taste is...
I am a fruit. I have sharp spikes (duri). I have a strong smell. My flesh is yellow and sweet. I am a...
questions.desc: Indikator 3: Buah berduri dan berbau menyengat adalah Durian.

questions.text: Which pair is correct?
Which statement is TRUE?
questions.desc: Indikator 5: Pernyataan yang benar adalah kue rasanya manis.

questions.text:
Arrange the words: sour - is - The - mango.
The correct sentence is...
questions.desc: Indikator 6: Susunan kalimat: Subject + To Be + Adjective.

questions.text: Look at the picture! The girl is drinking medicine. It tastes...
Read the text: 'Siti does not like chili sauce. She loves candies.' It means Siti dislikes ... food.
questions.desc: Indikator 8: Tidak suka sambal (chili) berarti tidak suka pedas (spicy).

questions.text: The Indonesian meaning of 'Sour' is...

Seller: 'Can I help you?'
Buyer: 'Yes, I need ... of bananas.'
questions.desc: Indikator 10: Satuan untuk pisang adalah sesisir (a hand).

questions.text: Look at the picture (Botol air mineral). It is...
questions.desc: Indikator 11: Satuan air dalam botol adalah 'a bottle'.

questions.text: Look at the picture (Kotak Pizza). Is it a plate of rice?
options: No, it is not. It is a box of pizza
No, it is a bowl of soup
questions.desc: Indikator 12: Respon negatif yang tepat untuk gambar pizza.

questions.text: Which picture matches 'A bar of chocolate'?
The English translation for 'Segelas jus' is...
Which pair is correct?
questions.desc: Indikator 15: Satuan roti tawar adalah 'a loaf' (sebungkus/sepotong besar).

questions.text:
A: 'I am hungry. Can I have ... of noodle?'
B: 'Here you are.'
Look at the picture! Cici is eating ... of ice cream.
questions.desc: Indikator 17: Es krim biasanya menggunakan satuan 'cone'.

questions.text:
Arrange the words: slice - a - of - pizza.
The correct phrase is...
questions.desc: Indikator 18: Susunan quantity: A + Unit + of + Noun.

questions.text: Look at the money (Gambar uang Rp 10.000). The amount is...
Look at the toy car. The price tag says 'Rp 45.000'. The toy costs...

Menu:
- Satay: Rp 15.000
- Soto: Rp 12.000
How much is the Satay?
questions.desc: Indikator 21: Harga sate di menu adalah 15.000.

questions.text:
Menu:
- Steak: Rp 50.000
- Burger: Rp 25.000
- Orange Juice: Rp 10.000
Which item is the cheapest (paling murah)?
questions.desc: Indikator 22: Item termurah adalah Jus Jeruk (10k).

questions.text: Look at the menu in No. 22. Is the Satay twelve thousand rupiahs?
options: No, it is not. It is fifteen thousand
questions.desc: Indikator 23: Konfirmasi harga sate (di soal no 21) adalah 15rb, bukan 12rb.

questions.text: You buy Satay (Rp 15.000) and Orange Juice (Rp 10.000). How much is the total?
The total price is Rp 80.000. You pay with Rp 100.000. How much is the change?
Look at the shirt with label 'Rp 65.000'. The sentence is...
options: The shirt is sixty five thousand rupiahs
The shirt is six thousand five hundred rupiahs
The shirt is fifty six thousand rupiahs

questions.text: Look at the picture! The girl has a high temperature and looks hot. She has a...
Look at the picture (Batuk). The correct sentence is...

A: 'I have a headache.'
B: 'You should ...'
questions.desc: Indikator 29: Saran untuk sakit kepala adalah istirahat.

questions.text: Playing in the rain for a long time can cause...
questions.desc: Indikator 30: Main hujan bisa menyebabkan pilek/flu.

questions.text: The cause of 'Toothache' is usually...
options: Eating too many sweets and not brushing teeth

questions.text:
Read the dialog:
Mom: 'Dayu, are you okay?'
Dayu: 'No, Mom. I have a stomachache.'
Who is sick?
questions.desc: Indikator 32: Tokoh yang sakit adalah Dayu.

questions.text: Why does he have a stomachache?
options: Because he eats late or spicy food

questions.text:
Text: 'Budi has a fever. His body is hot.'
Question: What does Budi feel?
questions.desc: Indikator 34: Gejala demam adalah badan panas.

questions.text: If you have sore eyes, you should not...

Look at the list:
1. Dry hands
2. Wash with soap
3. Wet hands
The correct order of washing hands is...
questions.desc: Indikator 36: Urutan cuci tangan (Basahi -> Sabun -> Keringkan).

questions.text:
Arrange the words: wearing - is - Cici - a - skirt.
The correct sentence is...
Look at the picture of a boy wearing a school uniform with a tie. Is he wearing a tie?
Look at the picture of a boy. He is playing at the park. He is wearing...
Joshua is going to sleep. He wears...
We wear a hat on our...
It is clothes for school. It is a...
The weather is very cold. You should wear a...
Which pair is correct?
questions.desc: Indikator 44: Pasangan kegiatan dan pakaian yang benar.

questions.text: In Islam, we must wear clothes that...
options: Cover the aurat and are polite
questions.desc: Indikator 45: Pakaian Islami = Menutup aurat dan sopan.

questions.text: Look at the picture of a lime (jeruk nipis). The sentence is: 'The lime tastes ...'
questions.desc: Indikator 46 (Adaptasi Esai): Jeruk nipis rasanya asam.

questions.text: I am thirsty after running. I want to...
Menu: Bakso (12k) + Ice Tea (4k). The total is...
Why does he have a toothache? Because he...
options: Ate too many sweets and didn't brush teeth

questions.text: These are clothes for the feet, EXCEPT (Kecuali)...
questions.desc: Indikator 50 (Adaptasi Esai): Cap (topi) untuk kepala, bukan kaki.
